name: EmoCheck
desc: Enhancing Emotional Awareness by Analyzing Facial Expressions in Real Time Using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and OpenCV.

name: AutoPrice
desc: Empowering Informed Automotive Decisions with SVM and Random Forest Algorithms for Accurate Price Predictions.

name: OptiTrader
desc: Creating an intelligent trading agent that adapts to cryptocurrency market data, maximizing profits and reducing risks using reinforcement learning.

name: CerviTrack
desc: Enhancing Early Diagnosis through XG-Boost Classifier for Cervical Cancer Risk Evaluation and Informed Healthcare Decision-Making.

name: StaffMaster
desc: An employee management application I developed using .NET technology, enabling administrators to seamlessly  add or remove employees from the platform and effortlessly update their status.

name: Embromate
desc: Conducting research and designing a machine as part of an exchange program at the Lyle School of Engineering in Dallas aiming at simplifying Tunisian embroidery and preserving the cultural heritage for future generations.
